objects.text:
• Advanced IR Reflection Technology
• Eco-friendly Nano-formulation
• Reduces Indoor Temperature
• Energy-saving Solution

product_details.name: Panache Cool Top Eco: Revolutionary Heat-Reflective Roof Coating
product_details.description:
• Advanced IR Reflection Technology for superior heat reduction
• Eco-friendly nano-technology based formulation
• 5 KG coverage for extensive roof protection
• High SRI (Solar Reflective Index) rating for maximum cooling efficiency
• Easy application process for all roof types
• Durable and weather-resistant coating
• Energy-saving solution for buildings
• Reduces indoor temperature significantly
• Professional-grade cooling solution
• Cost-effective alternative to traditional cooling methods

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and eco-conscious product advertisement, primarily designed to promote a cooling roof coating solution. The layout uses a diagonal split background made of two gradients—dark teal merging into turquoise on one side, and pale mint green gradients on the other. A vector bucket image representing the product is prominently placed on the right to attract focus. The banner integrates multiple text layers: “heading” and “subheading” in bold fonts emphasize the product name, while “product_title” and “description” describe its innovative, eco-friendly technology. The key promotional message “tagline” supports the green initiative. Pricing is highlighted in the “price” text layer in bold white against the background. A call-to-action button, formed by “cta_button_bg” and “cta” layers, encourages purchase interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal: #00695c
- Teal Green: #00796b
- Aquamarine: #7fffd4
- Soft Mint: #a5d6a7
- Pale Mint: #e8f5e9
- White: #ffffff
- Dark Teal Text: #004d40
product_color: The product image of "Cool Top Eco" uses a cool and professional color palette dominated by teal (#00857C), white (#FFFFFF), and navy blue (#00254D), with accents of lime green (#A6CE39). The teal serves as the primary background color on the container, offering a sense of freshness and environmental consciousness, while white is used to make the text highly legible and to emphasize the clean, eco-friendly aspect. The navy blue brand name provides contrast and authority, and the lime green in the logo adds an energetic, eco-centric touch. Together, these colors blend harmoniously, highlighting innovation and environmental benefit.
